unnormalised: Arrey bhai, 2BHK for ₹2Cr in Mumbai? My great-grandfather bought a haveli in Rajasthan for ₹500 back in '47! Guess property rates have gone slightly up, no?
normalised: Arrey bhai, two B-H-K for rupee two crore in Mumbai? My great-grandfather bought a haveli in Rajasthan for rupee five hundred back in forty seven! Guess property rates have gone slightly up, no?
